mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, REGID, REGDT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT USERSEQ, USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, ROLE FROM USER WHERE USERID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET USERID = #{userId}, USERNAME = #{userName}, CHGID =#{chgId}, CHGDT = SYSDATE() WHERE POSTSEQ = #{userId}
